full_summary:
### [English] the Government of Canada Tender Announcement for [Solicitation # 2022-P-002843-7440102]

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
**Status**: Cancelled

The Government of Canada is issuing a revised solicitation number 2022-P-002843-7440102 due to the cancellation of the initial tender. 

Below are the key details regarding this tender:

*   **Procurement Category**: Service
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bid
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: World
*   **Regions of Delivery**: Canada
*   **GSIN Description**:
    *   Financial Management
    *   Project Management Services
*   **Trade Agreements**:
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    *   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
    *   Atlantic Procurement Agreement
    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   **Contact Information**: For any questions, concerns or to receive further clarification, please contact:
    *   Name: Isabelle Doray
    *   Email: isabelle.doray@international.gc.ca
    *   Phone: 343-551-0084

### [French] L'Annonce de Marché du Gouvernement du Canada pour [Notification # 2022-P-002843-7440102]

**Type d'avis**: Demande de propositions
**Statut** : Annulé

Le gouvernement du Canada émet une nouvelle demande de notation portant le numéro 2022-P-002843-7440102 en raison de l'annulation de la demande initiale.

Afin d'y répondre, seuls quelques éléments essentiels sont à prendre en compte:

*   **Catégorie d'approvisionnement**:
